item.title: Hacker News Top Stories: Friday, November 1, 2024 at 6:20 PM UTC
item.description:
1. Apple Acquires Pixelmator (408 points | 226 comments)
2. Ask HN: Who is hiring? (November 2024) (139 points | 144 comments)
3. Alexander the Great's tunic identified in royal tomb at Vergina (191 points | 91 comments)
4. Broadwell's EDRAM: VCache Before VCache Was Cool (16 points | 1 comment)
5. TokenFormer: Rethinking Transformer Scaling with Tokenized Model Parameters (74 points | 9 comments)
6. Make It Yourself (82 points | 12 comments)
7. Diabetes risk soars for adults who had a sweet tooth as kids (27 points | 18 comments)
8. The Shell Hater's Handbook (4 points | 1 comment)
9. ChatGPT Search (1400 points | 1166 comments)
10. Notepad++ is 21 years old (27 points | 9 comments)
11. Ink: React for Interactive CLI Apps (73 points | 46 comments)
12. Notes for an Annotation SDK (2021) (9 points | discuss)
13. Iceberg A-68: The story of how a mega-berg transformed the ocean (9 points | discuss)
14. An Update on Apple M1/M2 GPU Drivers (552 points | 223 comments)
15. 34x34x34 Rubik's Cube (156 points | 66 comments)
16. The 1600s Were a Watershed for Swear Words (2022) (50 points | 37 comments)

18. The Dual Nature of Events in Event-Driven Architecture (32 points | 10 comments)
19. Embeddings are underrated (244 points | 117 comments)
20. Show HN: I built PixSpeed to optimize website images for free (6 points | 3 comments)

22. Iconic Gun-Makers Gave Sensitive Customer Information to Political Operatives (49 points | 28 comments)
23. Throbac: THrifty Roman numeral BAckwards-looking Computer (8 points | 6 comments)
24. Pythagora (GPT Pilot) (YC W24) Is Hiring ( | hide)
25. A new dental scam is to pull healthy teeth to sell you expensive fake ones (218 points | 211 comments)
26. How China Is Like the 19th Century U.S. (27 points | 2 comments)
27. Ubuntu Hoping to Remove Qt 5 Before Ubuntu 26.04 LTS (3 points | discuss)
28. Using the Strangler Fig with Mobile Apps (39 points | 11 comments)
29. 300 people applied to rent $700/month sleeping pods in downtown San Francisco (43 points | 52 comments)
30. NandGame – Build a computer from scratch (312 points | 47 comments)
